cleaned_text: 7 Best Homeopathic Medicines for Fever in Child & Adults [Fever](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/diet-in-fever) is a condition wherein your body temperature rises above the normal temperature (98.6°F). It is not a cause of concern until your body temperature reaches 101°F. In infants and children, even a slight increase in the body temperature must be looked into with utmost attention. Today Homeopathy section offers treatment for lots of health issues and various effective homeopathic medicines used for fever with other health issues such as [body ache](https://www.lybrate.com/treatment-for-body-ache), cold, [sneezing](https://www.lybrate.com/treatment-for-sneezing), and more. Cause - Seasonal [Flu](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/flu) [Bacterial infections](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/bacterial-infections) Homeopathic Medicine for Fever in Summer Check out the best homeoapthic remedies for viral fever with other health problems such as [cough](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/cough), cold, body ache for children and adults. These homeopathic remedies are natural, non-addictive in nature and offer no side effects. - Aconite: This homeopathic medicine for fever with restlessness and [anxiety](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/anxiety). The patient is seen with an [increased thirst](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/increased-thirst)for cold water and intolerable body aches. Aconite is considered in fevers which have increased post sudden exposure to cold winds. - Bryonia Alba: This homeopathy medicine is used for fever and body aches.. A person with a fever might want to lie down all the time in order to get relief from the body aches and even the slightest movement might cause them [pain](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/pain). An increased thirst for water is also seen. - Nux Vomica: This is a homeopathic cure for fever with shivering or chills problem. Nux Vomica is made of natural substances and is of great help in cases of shivering and chilliness. A person with this fever might want to remain covered all the time. - Gelsemium: This natural homeopathic remedy is very beneficial for fever where the patients suffer from [dizziness](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/dizziness), weakness, and a tendency to faint. This condition is marked by an absence of thirst. - Rhus Tox: This homeoapthic remedy is considered to be the first choice in people who have fever along with extreme restlessness and body aches. A person experiencing this type of fever might want to remain in motion throughout in order to avoid restlessness. This remedy is also given for fevers as a result of getting wet in the rain. - Homeopathic Medicines for Fever with Flu or Influenza type: Influenza is a viral infection and is characterized by sudden fever, cough, pain in eyes, body aches, [headaches](https://www.lybrate.com/topic/headaches), and pain in eyes. The homeopathic medicines that are of great help in influenza are Aconite, Gelsemium, and Eupatorium Perfoliatum. Aconite is given in influenza when cold air exposure is the cause. This is usually followed by an immediate fever and nasal discharges. Restlessness and anxiety are also seen with fever. Gelsemium is the best cure for a runny nose and sneezing along with pain in the head and eyes. The patient might also have [drowsiness](https://www.lybrate.com/treatment-for-drowsiness)and weakness. Eupatorium Perfoliatum is of great help in fever with influenza when the patient has extreme pain. This remedy has no side effects and provides instant relief from pain. - Homeopathic medicines for fever with malaria: Malaria is characterized by fever accompanied by chills and excessive [sweating](https://www.lybrate.com/treatment-for-sweating). The homeopathic medicines for malaria are Gelsemium, Arsenic Album, Nux Vomica, and Eupatorium Perfoliatum. The patients who benefit from Gelsemium usually complain of the absence of thirst and extreme chilliness. Arsenic Album is of help in people who are easily exhausted and need some water at short intervals. Nux Vomica is for patients who prefer to be covered in warm clothes during heat, cold, and sweat. These are only some of the homeoapthic medicines shared for fever but is better that one must consult a homeopathic practitioner before popping these medicines, as your doctor will prescribe medicines based on your symptoms, which will vary from person to person.
